Saunders Townsend

  1. Foster Name: Richard S.
  2. Foster Family: Otto Wendt
  3. Location of Family: West Point, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: West Point, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 10/17/1901
  8. Date of Death: 5/11/1933, Marion County, KS
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Cuming Democrat, 29 October 1909; West Point Republican, 29 October 1909; Article from The Peabody Gazette, 25 May 1911 on National Orpha Train Complex website; 1910 United States Federal Census; Find-A-Grave for Richard S. Townsend.
